roleset.name: extend for some period of time
roleset.note: LAST-V NOTES: Frames file for 'last' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. Verbnet entry 54.2, no indication of other framed members. No Framenet entry. No comparison. (from last.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: last-v: prepositional period
example.text: The turmoil in junk bonds may last for years, investors and traders say.

example.name: last-v: not prepositional
example.text: Some traders said the popularity of issues that gained yesterday won't last long, as investors will rotate their buying choices over the short term.
example.arg: the popularity of issues that gained yesterday
as investors will rotate their buying choices over the short term

example.name: last-v: TMP
example.text: summer lasts till the end of September .

roleset.name: later than/behind all other entities
roleset.note: LAST-J NOTES: Added automatically by Julia. Related to last.xml (from last.02-j)

example.name: last-j
example.text: Malaysia Airlines MH370: Co-pilot-1 was last *PRO*-1 to communicate from cockpit.
